reviews.review: yes
great game  Moon2cute

This game is amazing. Anyone who is considering buying this game, I highly recommend it. At first it may seem very overwhelming with all of the perks, characters, abilities etc, but once you learn how it all works it is extremely addictive. At the time of writing this review I only have just shy of 250 hours but I plan to put many, many more hours in.

The game is also updated very consistently, with each chapter being released once every 2 months. Each chapter brings new character(s) with new maps and teachable perks. Having the game update this consistently keeps people engaged. With the content of each chapter roughly taking 2 months to obtain. Another recently added feature to the game is the addition of The Rift with each Mid-Chapter update. This is a Battle-Pass like system where the players can earn cosmetics through completing challenges and leveling up The Rift. This adds some bonus content for players to enjoy in-between the release of chapters. These 2 factors keep the game extremely engaging, which is one reason why I know I will continue playing this game for a long time. 

The only real cons when it comes to this game are how expensive the DLC is, and the amount of bugs and issues which come with each chapter. However the game is developed by a fairly small company so the game is expected to have issues, especially with so much new content coming so quickly. 

All in all, this is probably my favourite game right now, and will continue to be for a long time.

Dead By Daylight é um jogo que entrega uma proposta que não lembro de ter sido entregue antes por outro game, 5 jogadores, com um sendo um killer e os outros 4 sendo sobreviventes, o objetivo dos sobreviventes a principio é consertar geradores de energia para abrir um portão e fugir enquanto o assassino tem que enganchar todos os sobreviventes em ganchos para servir de oferenda para uma entidade maligna, estranho não? 
O game tem muitos personagens (sobreviventes e assassinos,) tendo atualizações toda hora de novos personagens interessantes sendo alguns de personagens de filmes e jogos, alguns exemplos:
Ghost face - Panico / Freddy Krueger - A Nightmare on Elm Street / michael myers - Halloween

Algo que me incomoda nesse jogo é o quão limitado á ideia original que os desenvolvedores estão, tanto é que sempre há alguma abaixa de jogadores em tempos até o lançamento de algum personagem/mapa novo,
MAS uma coisa que tenho q dar mérito é o quão dedicado e compromissado essa empresa é com o game e com os jogadores, sempre tirando as duvidas e sempre fazendo tudo no game com carinho, mesmo que errando de vez em quando são empresas como essa que nós devemos ter o comprometimento de apoiar quando necessário.

*RESUMO*

Compre, vale a pena, o preço com ou sem desconto já ta valendo a pena, mas garanta que tenha outros amigos pra jogar com você, o game perde a graça jogando em tempos sozinho.
This game is a lot of fun to play by yourself or with friends.  Had it on PS4 and now on PC and it still doesn't feel old or boring.
I like the different killers and survivors
Quanto mais você joga mais você percebe o quanto esse jogo não vale a pena, até o ponto que você já jogou tanto que não quer parar. Evite
E

Este juego ha cambiado, cuando salio estaba muy bien porque era novedad y la dinamica del juego pues es divertida, luego empezaron los BUGS por todos lados, cosa que arreglaron un 40% de ellos. Pero este ultimo año crecio bastante como juego, mejorando el HUD, añadiendo la tienda, DLC's nuevos (aunque son casi todos de pago), nuevo apartado de misiones, pase de batalla... Todo muy bonito hasta que te pones a jugar una partida tras otra, y te das cuenta de que el 80% de los asesinos campean o juegan alrededor del gancho. Eres rank 10 (por poner un intermedio) y te emparejan con ranks 18 tanto de superviviente como de asesino. Luego llega el momento de que esos 3 compañeros mueren porque son novatos y no saben muy bien que hacer y dices bueno al menos ahora tengo trampilla, pero no, el asesino la encuentra antes que tu (muchas veces antes de matar al ultimo la buscan y la campean) y la cierra, ahora como abres las puertas? tienes un temporizador y no solo eso, el asesino desde 50metros de distancia ve la luz de la puerta, y como esten cerca una de la otra, olvidate de salir. 
El problema de este juego es que a medida que pasaron los años se han centrado en escuhcar los lloros y lamentos de los asesinos que no sabian jugar y no daban cogido al superviviente que sabia moverse por el mapa, primero quitando MUCHOS de los pallets de cada mapa, luego ganando VELOCIDAD DE MOVIMIENTO cada X segundos que te sigue hasta NIVEL 3, luego el temporizador de las puertas y finalmente el poder cerrar la trampilla. Pero que pasa con los supervivientes que nos comemos un TUNNELING o un CAMPEO¿?¿? TE JODES Y BAILAS. FIN. Tengo mas de 1000 hrs jugadas, se de lo que hablo, y recomiendo el juego, pero ten MUCHA paciencia y vive con ello. Espero que lean quiza este u otro comentario, pero que ayuden un poco mas al superviviente, porque si hablamos de los perks de asesinos, la cantidad de ellos que hay para revelar donde estan los supervivientes comparado con los de superviviente para ver al asesino y las ventajas de uno y de otros, son risibles.

что я могу сказать про дбд наиграв 1100+ часов игра очень увлекательная в ней много моментов которые доставляют тебе удовольствие от попадания в отличный скиллчек до мансов от маньяка , от удара по выжившему до 4 жертвоприношений , это та игра в которой особенно весело играть с друзьями , но нельзя не сказать и о минусах : во первых это токсичное коммьюнити которые могут обосрать тебя за то что ты играешь как ты хочешь речь идёт и об маньяке и об выжившем во вторых это хитбоксы и выделенные сервера за аню это особо ощущается когда топор летит в стороне от тебя , но всё равно по тебе попадает или когда ты уже  сбросил  доску но убийца всё равно даёт тебе хит , об недоработках можно говорить много , но я считаю то что это прекрасная игра и я советую попробовать  её всем кто это читает , лично я думаю что наиграю ещё не одну пару часов неё.

This game is so broken it's not funny. But, for some reason, I love it anyway. All characters in the game are real players, so it's impossible to know exactly what any person will do in any given scenario with 100% certainty. Calling it a horror game isn't really as close to the truth as calling it a survival strategy game. The objective is to outsmart your opponent and be able to survive. The only thing I will mention is to not get salty when someone is better than you at the game. The toxicity in this community is pretty much a meme in r/deadbydaylight at this point, so don't contribute to it. If you get absolutely annihilated, respect your opponent(s) and move on. All in all, good game, play it.

As of 4.5.0 the game as a whole is in a terrible state, game wise. Survivor movement and desync is even worse than initial tests for dedicated servers, those same servers are still a problem no matter what though. Having played this much of the game prior to 4.5, i liked the game, it was annoying sometimes but only cause of servers OR playerbase, but now its the servers, playerbase, AND the base game as in its movement, the hitboxes, the UI and everything in between. This game is in the worst state possible as of right now.

I didn't think I would get into this game, but now with ~170 hours, i find this to be a fun game aside from mainstream games that I usually play like Fortnite and Overwatch. This game is probably more fun if you play with friends, but playing on your own and learning it is not bad too. It takes a while to adjust and learn about the game, but overall a good game.
